name: Disintegration Technical Beta
description:
Disintegration features both a thrilling single-player campaign and frenetic PvP multiplayer. In multiplayer, Gravcycle pilots and their ground Crews compete with a variety of unique unit abilities and arsenals to dominate the battle. Join the technical beta today and compete against other pilots and their Crews!

Please note this is the technical beta for Disintegration’s multiplayer portion of the game and is still in development. You may encounter bugs, matchmaking problems, placeholder items, framerate drops, and other unforeseen issues.

The closed technical beta will be playable on January 28 and January 29 2020. The open technical beta will follow from January 31 7 PM to February 2 2020 8:59 AM (CET). Subject to change. See disintegrationgame.com for latest info.

Content included:
- Seven unique crews
- Two different modes
- Two dynamic maps

Progress will not be carried over to the main game when released. The beta is only available in English. The full release will support multiple languages.
